poem:
Title: "Transgressions in Thuringia"

In Halle's court the gavel breaks,
Upon a phrase forbidden, stark.
AfD's Hoffnung speaks,
A darkened past does echo, hark!

Guilt assigned for words deployed,
A sum of €13,000 weighted.
Höcke's ambition slyly toyed,
A twisted tongue, history baited.

Elections loom amidst the strife,
Thuringia teeters on the edge.
Tamed though, the firebrand's rife,
Justice sings a sacred pledge.
